casebody.data:
IN RE: Durward D. CASTEEL NO. 2018-B-1745 Supreme Court of Louisiana. November 5, 2018

ORDER

Considering the Joint Petition for Interim Suspension filed by respondent, Durward D. Casteel, and the Office of Disciplinary Counsel,

IT IS ORDERED that Durward D. Casteel, Louisiana Bar Roll number 18830, be and he hereby is suspended from the practice of law on an interim basis pursuant to Supreme Court Rule XIX, § 19.3, pending further orders of this court. Pursuant to Supreme Court Rule XIX, § 26(E), this order is effective immediately.
